JENV     Set the Java Runtime Environment path for MATLAB

        Usage:
            jenv [options ...]

        Description:
            Specify custom location of Java Runtime Environment path for MATLAB.

        Command Line Options:
            system                                        : The system version of JRE will be used by MATLAB.
            factory                                       : MATLAB provided JRE will be used.
            <jre_path>                                    : User provided location will be used by MATLAB.
            -clear                                        : Will remove the JRE configuration for an individual user.
            -allusers system/factory/<jre_path>           : Set JRE path for all users.
            -allusers -clear                              : It will remove the JRE configuration for each MATLAB installation for all users.
